definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: He was a descendant of patriots.
sentences.chinese: 他的一家都是從戎的愛國者。

sentences.english: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
sentences.chinese: 自由之樹必須以愛國者和暴君的血灌溉既開花。

sentences.english: In a front-page headline it said he was "a collector and a patriot".
sentences.chinese: 頭版的一個標題稱他是“收藏家和愛國者”。

sentences.english: To effect objects so dear to every patriot I shall devote myself with anxious solicitude.
sentences.chinese: 爲達成每個愛國者的宿願，我將迫不及待地全力以赴。

sentences.english: Shen Kuo was an outstanding patriot in the North Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 沈括是北宋一位出色的愛國者。

sentences.english: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time, with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
sentences.chinese: 自由之樹必須不時以愛國者與暴君的鮮血澆灌。

sentences.english: He was a patriot, but not a nationalist.
sentences.chinese: 他是個愛國者，卻非民族主義分子。

sentences.english: U.S. Patriot missiles are expected to be deployed in Poland this year.
sentences.chinese: 美國的愛國者導彈預計今年將在波蘭部署。

sentences.english: All peace loving patriots should boycott chinese products.
sentences.chinese: 所有熱愛和平的愛國者應該抵制中國貨。

sentences.english: As a true patriot, I would gladly die in battle defending my homeland.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個真正的愛國者，我樂意爲我的祖國橫屍沙場。

sentences.english: As a true patriot, I would gladly die in battle defending my homeland.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個真正的愛國者，我樂意爲我的祖國橫屍沙場。

sentences.english: We have Bibles and Guns. What else do Patriots need?
sentences.chinese: 我們有聖經和槍，愛國者擁有這些，別無所求。

sentences.english: I am the real desh bhakt.
Or tickets to the Patriots or to the Red Sox.
sentences.chinese: 新英格蘭愛國者隊“或“紅襪隊“的門票也一樣。

sentences.english: In 1988, Kiam Bought the New England Patriots.
sentences.chinese: 1988年，基阿姆買下了“新英格蘭愛國者”。

sentences.english: Jack, Jr. is born at the end of PG.
sentences.chinese: 小杰克出生於《愛國者遊戲》結束的時候。

definition: Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
to call loudly (idiom); to get people's attention/to make one's views known
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
